text: avarute pitav kalpiccapeale avar pravesiccappeal allahuvinre vidhiyil ninnonnum avarilninn tatannunirttan addehattinu sadhiccilla. ya'akhubinre manas'siluntayirunna oragraham addeham purttikariccuvennu matram. nam pathippiccukeatuttatinal addeham arivullavanan. ennal manusyarilerepperum ariyunnilla
